ygData.subject: Proto 13
ygData.msgSnippet: * Within the darkness three figures of Sirosean authority huddled together over a dimly lit computer screen whilst they became obliveouse to the entire world

* Within the darkness three figures of Sirosean authority huddled together 
over a dimly lit computer screen whilst they became obliveouse to the entire 
world around them, speaking in the hushed voices that could only mean one 
thing: A very important and critacal decision was being put into question.
The tallest and slimmest of the metallic beings set a finger against the lit 
glass, directing his comrads attention to the figure whom was displayed for 
all to see.
It was clearly visible that the being in view was most assuradly female and 
in a very healthy state of existance. Well...it should be.  It was 
completely artificially automated.*

" We've lost contact with Prototype 13."

* The second of the white clad male robots, a rather stumpy one at that, 
sneered before glancing up.*

" And exactly when did THIS happen?"

* The tall figure appeared disappointed.*

" We lost communications with Proto 13 about the same time as the Delta 
Trica was reported to have gone down."

" I see..." * the stumpy man sighed before turning his attentions to the 
most silent of the trio, one whom seemed deep in thought.
The slim figure, known well as Kere, eyed his built assosiate before 
returning Brisa's glance. Soon returning his gaze to the younger of the 
three.*

" What's on your mind, Beld?"

* Beld, a rather build young transformer whom had just been reassigned from 
the Sirose millitary to it's scientific frounteer only 7 yours ago, stood 
only a few inches less then Kere. Though his mind was just as sharp, despice 
the gap in years between the two.
Beld seemed to be jerked into reality at the mention of his name before 
eyeing Kere and Brisa, soon bringing his hand to his chin and resting his 
head upon it.*

" Just thinkin."

* Brisa scowled.* " Well?!"

* Beld sighed.*

" Is there any sign of whether Proto 13's active or not?"

* Kere shook his head.*

" No. Not even it's spark signature has been registered on any of the 
scanners since the disappearence of that ship it was assigned to."

" Unfortunate..." * Brisa snorted before peering back into the lifeless blue 
eyes of the image that stared at him from the console screen. Soon to turn 
his back to the computer and his comrads.*

" If you ask me, if it's still alive it should be terminated. There's no 
telling of what might happen if it's still active. "

" We've spent alot of money and time on this, Brisa. I don't think we can 
afford to kill this experiement before we retreve proof that it's 
defective." * Kere retorted rather sharply. So, in fact, that even Beld 
turned to look at the blank expressions of his fellow scientist.
Though, Brisa only shrugged.*

" We'll see what the Grand Destroyer has to say about this."

* Beld jerked to life.*

" Brisa! You can't! Proto is a sentient being! She's ALIVE!  You can't just 
decide to kill her like it's nothing any differne then putting out the weeks 
trash!"

* Brisa chuckled coldly before half turning towards the stressed young bot, 
completely covered in shadow.*

" What's what you're saying, Kid. You might end up nipping off a little more 
then you can handle. "

* Quickly turning his back to the soldier the stubby bot headed towards the 
exit to the room.* " THEN we'll see who can and can't do what."

* Silence filled the dark room soon after Brisa's leaving before the sound 
of armor striking a metallic surface shattered all.
Kere shook his head as Beld pulled his fist back from a fair sized dent in 
the wall.*

" That pompus ass!"  * Beld cursed before abruptly turning towards Kere.*

" I can't believe he can even consider such a thing! We worked SO HARD on 
that Prototype! Used eqiptment that you can't even find in this sector 
without slitting someones throat...and he wants to throw all of that away? "

* Kere sighed.* " I know. I don't wanna see the end of this project any more 
then you do...but if Brisa gets his way with the Grand Destroyer...we'll 
have no choice other then to pull the plug on Proto 13."

* Beld closed his optics and clenched his jaw.
The Grand Destroyer's decision was FINAL.*
